ðŸ“– Summary: The `sks-space-cli` is a command-line tool designed to simplify VPS (Virtual Private Server) management. It automates tasks such as connecting to the server via SSH, setting up the environment, deploying projects (SPA, Node.js, static files), and performing cleanup operations, aiming to streamline the deployment process for developers.
